title: The Writer's Almanac - Tuesday, July 14, 2020
description: On this date in 1881, Billy the Kid was shot and killed by Sheriff Pat Garrett in New Mexico Territory. He was 22 years old.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: On this date in 1881, Billy the Kid was shot and killed by Sheriff Pat Garrett in New Mexico Territory. He was 22 years old.
